title: Heavy Rainfall
content: Heavy rainfall affected Mangalore Rural, leading to significant flooding in several villages. The local authorities are working to manage the situation and provide assistance to the affected residents.

title: PEPPER PRICES MAY INCREASE
content: The cold climate has led to an increase in pepper consumption. As a result, the current prices for pepper in Cochin are at Rs. 580-585 per kilogram, while the best quality is being traded at Rs. 680-700 per kilogram.

title: Illegally imported arecanut seized
content: The price of arecanut beginning to fall, CAMPCO, Mangaluru, wrote to Prime Minister Modi seeking his intervention to ensure the seized arecanut’s auction floor price is maintained.

title: Power Outage
content: Scheduled maintenance outage from 11:00 AM to 5:00 PM. Affected areas: Hampankatta, B B Alabi Road, MG Road, Falnir First Cross, Kadri, Bendoorwell, Bejai, Kankanady.

title: Power Cut
content: From 26-12-24 to 28-12-24 electricity won't be available from 9.00 am to 12.00 pm
